ExpSyntax.val: 'LG11: How Do I Set Logic to Be Executed When the End User Enters/Leaves a Control?'

Text.val: Here, the cursor can jump to either fields on this task, or on the parent,
depending on the value of the 'Which generation?' variable (0 or 1).
The controls are named the same for this example.

ExpSyntax.val: 'LG10: How Do I Make the Cursor Jump to a Specific Control?'
